fields.name: Clean Up (1x, Charge 100%):
fields.value: If your target would die tonight, their role is replaced with "Cleaned," but you will privately learn their role. Their attacker(s) will appear to have 0.0x attack power tonight. Their Mafia-aligned attacker(s) will not ever appear to have killed your target. No ammo is spent if your target does not die.

fields.name: Lock Up:
fields.value: Any investigative abilities targeting your target tonight will silently fail. If your standard deviation is below 27.50%, you will also learn the roles which visited your target.

fields.name: Meticulous (Passive, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. If you die, your role will be replaced with "Cleaned."
